item.description:
10 Steps to Spiritual Enlightenment

Learn ways to speed up the freedom from suffering that you are really looking for. Prioritize what is really important and let go of the attachment to your ego and it's demands. Many practical tips will be presented on how to "do" this and let go. Herb will also share his gradual process of freeing himself.

7-10pm

$40 cost, sliding scale to $20

Bsides Spiritual Development workshops, Herb Pearce is a master of the Enneagram, having taught 2000 Enneagram workshops, worked with many individuals, couples, families, parents and children using this model as a therapist/coach, and he is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram.

He also does team building trainings in organizations and teaches the Enneagram to schools, churches, groups, clubs, etc. as well as in homes where people organize workshops for friends, family or associates.

Herb's book is available to purchase. Vegetarian efreshments served.

Herb Pearce
www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: 10 Steps to Spiritual Enlightenment
